async get(extended: bool = None, item_type: str = None, tag_id: int = None, offset: int = None, count: int = None, fields: str = None, is_from_snackbar: bool = None)¶
Parameters

  • extended – ‘1’ — to return additional ‘wall’, ‘profiles’, and ‘groups’ fields. By default: ‘0’.

  • item_type –

  • tag_id – Tag ID.

  • offset – Offset needed to return a specific subset of users.

  • count – Number of users to return.

async remove_link(link_id: str = None, link: str = None)¶

Removes link from the user’s faves. :param link_id: Link ID (can be obtained by [vk.com/dev/faves.getLinks|faves.getLinks] method). :param link: Link URL
